General.Name: Homeritz Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Homeritz Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells upholstery furniture products in Malaysia. The company provides upholstery home furniture products, including leather and fabric-based sofas, dining chairs, and bed frames; other home furniture, such as cushion seats, sofa beds, and tables; and lifestyle furniture products under the eritz brand, as well as furniture parts. It is also involved in the property investment business. The company also exports its products to approximately 40 countries, including Europe, Australasia, North and South America, Asia, and Africa. Homeritz Corporation Berhad was founded in 1997 and is based in Muar, Malaysia.
